query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/09/22 (of last update/validation) SELECT b.tablespace_name , CASE WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '32768' THEN '32K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '16384' THEN '16K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '8192' THEN '8K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '4096' THEN '4K' ELSE to_char(BLOCK_SIZE) END BLOCK_SIZE , CASE WHEN current_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN current_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(current_size,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END ACTUAL , CASE WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END USED , CASE WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(free_space,0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE /* ---- Keep it for extended testing , CASE WHEN nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END "80PCT" */ , CASE WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END "PCT80" --, nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0) AS "80PCT" , CASE WHEN max_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/(1024*1024),3),'FM99000.00') || ' TB' WHEN max_size = 32767 THEN TO_CHAR(32767, 'FM99000.00')||' MB' WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,3),'FM99000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM99000.00') || ' MB' END MAX , ROUND ( ( (current_size - nvl(free_space, 0)) / max_size) * 100,2) pct_used , files , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT EXTENT_MGMT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT SEGMENT_SPACE_MGMT , STATUS --, RANK() OVER(partition by b.tablespace_name order by files) "RANK" FROM ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY tablespace_name ) a, ( SELECT t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR (SUM (DECODE (autoextensible, 'YES', maxbytes, bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED , COUNT (file_name) files FROM dba_data_files df , dba_tablespaces t where t.tablespace_name = df.tablespace_name GROUP BY t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED ) b WHERE a.tablespace_name(+) = b.tablespace_name and b.CONTENTS = 'PERMANENT' ORDER BY tablespace_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/09/18 (of last update/validation) --DATAFILES SELECT b.file_id file# , tablespace_name , b.block_size , CASE WHEN instr(b.file_name, '+') > 1 THEN substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '/',1)-1) WHEN instr(b.file_name, '/',-1) > 1 THEN substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '/',-1)-1) WHEN instr(b.file_name, '\',-1) > 1 THEN substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '\',-1)-1) END "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" , b.file_name , creation_time , CASE WHEN current_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN current_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(current_size,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END ACTUAL , CASE WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size)/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size)/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END USED , CASE WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(free_space,0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE , CASE WHEN :BIGFILE = 'YES' THEN TO_CHAR((max_size/1024),'FM90000.00') || ' GB' -- additional coding needed to check for max file size based on block size ELSE CASE WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (b.block_size*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((b.block_size*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' ELSE CASE WHEN max_size >= (b.block_size*4096)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((b.block_size*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' --WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,2),'FM90000.00') || ' GB' --WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((b.block_size*4)-1,2),'FM90000.00') || ' MB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END END END "MAX SIZE" --, b.max_size , increment_by "INCREMENT" , CASE WHEN :BIGFILE = 'YES' THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)/(1024),2), 'FM9000.00')||' GB' ELSE CASE WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (b.block_size*4) THEN TO_CHAR((b.block_size*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' GB' ELSE CASE --WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)/(1024*1024),2), 'FM000.00')||' TB' WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)/(1024),2), 'FM90000.00')||' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8), 'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END END END "PCT80" , TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(((current_size - free_space) / max_size) * 100,current_size/max_size*100),2), 'FM900.00') pct_used , ONLINE_STATUS STATUS , RANK() OVER(partition by b.tablespace_name order by (nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size))) "RANK" , DENSE_RANK() OVER(partition by b.tablespace_name order by (nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size))) "DENSE_RANK" FROM ( SELECT file_id, FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY file_id ) A, ( SELECT df.file_id , df.file_name , d.creation_time , df.tablespace_name , FLOOR ((df.bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR ((DECODE (df.autoextensible, 'YES', df.maxbytes, df.bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , CASE WHEN df.autoextensible = 'YES' THEN case when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024/1024 || ' GB' when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024 || ' MB' else (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024||' KB' END end increment_by , df.ONLINE_STATUS , d.block_size FROM dba_data_files df , v$datafile d where df.file_id = d.file# ) b WHERE A.file_id(+) = b.file_id and tablespace_name = :TABLESPACE_NAME ORDER BY file# , tablespace_name , file_name
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select dbms_metadata.get_ddl('TABLESPACE', :TABLESPACE_NAME)||';'||chr(13)||chr(10) "DDL_" from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) with tabseg as ( select s.OWNER , s.TABLESPACE_NAME , s.SEGMENT_TYPE , t.TABLE_NAME , t.LAST_ANALYZED , CASE WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN t.NUM_ROWS >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NUM_ROWS/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.NUM_ROWS,'FM000.00') || ' ' END NUM_ROWS , CASE WHEN t.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN t.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN t.sample_size >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN t.sample_size >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.sample_size/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.sample_size,'FM000.00') || ' ' END SAMPLE_SIZE , t.AVG_ROW_LEN , CASE WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN t.INITIAL_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.INITIAL_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.INITIAL_EXTENT,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END INITIAL_EXTENT , CASE WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN t.NEXT_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(t.NEXT_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(t.NEXT_EXTENT,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END NEXT_EXTENT , s.EXTENTS , CASE WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN s.BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN s.BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.BYTES/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(s.BYTES,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END BYTES , tm.INSERTS , tm.UPDATES , tm.DELETES , tm.TRUNCATED , tm.TIMESTAMP from dba_tables t , dba_segments s , dba_tab_modifications tm where t.table_name = s.segment_name and t.table_name = tm.table_name(+) and t.owner = s.owner and t.owner = tm.table_owner(+) and t.tablespace_name = s.tablespace_name and t.num_rows > 0 ) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- select * from tabseg where tablespace_name = :TABLESPACE_NAME order by OWNER , TABLESPACE_NAME , SEGMENT_TYPE

(BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1||'M;' when power(2,floor(log(2, USED))) < USED then power(2,floor(log(2, USED)+1))||'M;' else power(2,floor(log(2, USED)))||'M;' end "RESIZE DATAFILE(Ref: Used)" , 'ALTER DATABASE DATAFILE '||''''||FILE_NAME||''''||' RESIZE '|| case when power(2,floor(log(2,PCT80)+1)) >=(BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 then (BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1||'M;' when power(2,floor(log(2, PCT80))) < PCT80 then power(2,floor(log(2, PCT80)+1))||'M;' else power(2,floor(log(2, PCT80)))||'M;' end "RESIZE DATAFILE(Ref: PCT80)" from datafiles where TABLESPACE_NAME = :TABLESPACE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT d.inst_id , d.file# , t.name tablespace_name , substr(d.name, 1, instr(d.name, '/',-1)-1) "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" , d.name file_name , f.phyblkrd "Blocks Read" , f.phyblkwrt "Blocks Writen" , f.phyblkrd + f.phyblkwrt "Total I/O" FROM gv$filestat f , gv$datafile d , gv$tablespace t WHERE d.inst_id = f.inst_id AND d.inst_id = t.inst_id AND d.file# = f.file# AND d.ts# = t.ts# AND t.name = :TABLESPACE_NAME ORDER BY d.inst_id , f.phyblkrd + f.phyblkwrt DESC

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) ------------- WITH DFDETAILS as ( select * from ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY tablespace_name ) a, ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR (SUM (DECODE (autoextensible, 'YES', maxbytes, bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , COUNT (file_name) files FROM dba_data_files GROUP BY tablespace_name ) b WHERE A.tablespace_name(+) = b.tablespace_name ORDER BY a.tablespace_name ) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ select CASE WHEN sum(current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(current_size)/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.000') || ' TB' WHEN sum(current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(current_size)/1024,2),'FM9000.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(current_size),'FM9000.000') || ' MB' END "ACTUAL" , CASE WHEN sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size))/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.000') || ' TB' WHEN sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size))/1024,2),'FM9000.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)),'FM9000.000') || ' MB' END "USED" , CASE WHEN sum(nvl(free_space,0)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(free_space,0))/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.000') || ' TB' WHEN sum(nvl(free_space,0)) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(free_space,0))/1024,2),'FM9000.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(nvl(free_space,0)),'FM9000.000') || ' MB' END "FREE" , round(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size))/sum(current_size)*100, 3) "PCT USED" from DFDETAILS

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT tablespace_name , contents , extent_management , threshold_type , metrics_name , warning_operator , warning_value , critical_operator , critical_value FROM dba_tablespace_thresholds WHERE tablespace_name = :TABLESPACE_NAME ORDER BY tablespace_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select 'SELECT DBMS_METADATA.GET_DDL('||''''||'INDEX'||''''||','||''''||INDEX_NAME||''''||','||''''||OWNER||''''||') DDL_ FROM DUAL;' "CREATE STATEMENT" , 'ALTER INDEX '||OWNER||'.'||INDEX_NAME||' REBUILD TABLESPACE '||TABLESPACE_NAME||';' "REBUILD STATEMENT" FROM DBA_INDEXES WHERE TABLESPACE_NAME = :TABLESPACE_NAME ORDER BY INDEX_NAME

/* Anand Mahajani Date: March 8, 2018 Changed CREATION_TIME into single column (MM/YYYY) instead of two YYYY, MM */ select t.name tablespace_name , to_char(creation_time, 'YYYY/MM') CREATED , case WHEN sum(BYTES) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(BYTES)/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN sum(BYTES) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(BYTES)/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN sum(BYTES) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(BYTES)/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(BYTES),'FM9000.00') || ' ' END BYTES , CASE WHEN sum(BYTES) over (partition by t.name order by to_char(creation_time, 'YYYY/MM')) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND( sum(BYTES) over (partition by t.name order by to_char(creation_time, 'YYYY/MM'))/(1024*1024*1024),2), 'FM9000.00')||' GB' WHEN sum(BYTES) over (partition by t.name order by to_char(creation_time, 'YYYY/MM')) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND( sum(BYTES) over (partition by t.name order by to_char(creation_time, 'YYYY/MM'))/(1024*1024),2), 'FM9000.00')||' MB' WHEN sum(BYTES) over (partition by t.name order by to_char(creation_time, 'YYYY/MM')) >= (1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND( sum(BYTES) over (partition by t.name order by to_char(creation_time, 'YYYY/MM'))/(1024),2), 'FM9000.00')||' KB' ELSE to_char(sum(BYTES) over (partition by t.name order by to_char(creation_time, 'YYYY/MM')), 'FM9000.00')||' B' END "RUNNING TOTAL" from v$datafile d , v$tablespace t where t.TS# = d.TS# AND t.name = :TABLESPACE_NAME group by t.name , to_char(creation_time, 'YYYY/MM') , bytes order by t.name , to_char(creation_time, 'YYYY/MM')

*/ with ts_growth as ( SELECT trunc(sp.begin_interval_time) "DATES" , ts.tsname TABLESPACE_NAME , CASE WHEN max(round(tsu.tablespace_size * dt.block_size)) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max(round(tsu.tablespace_size * dt.block_size))/(1024*1024*1024),3),'FM999000.000') || ' GB' WHEN max(round(tsu.tablespace_size * dt.block_size)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max(round(tsu.tablespace_size * dt.block_size))/(1024*1024),3),'FM999000.000') || ' MB' WHEN max(round(tsu.tablespace_size * dt.block_size)) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max(round(tsu.tablespace_size * dt.block_size))/1024,3),'FM999000.000') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max(round(tsu.tablespace_size * dt.block_size)),'FM999000.000') || ' ' END CURRENT_SIZE , CASE WHEN max(round(tsu.tablespace_usedsize * dt.block_size)) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max(round(tsu.tablespace_usedsize * dt.block_size))/(1024*1024*1024),3),'FM999000.000') || ' GB' WHEN max(round(tsu.tablespace_usedsize * dt.block_size)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max(round(tsu.tablespace_usedsize * dt.block_size))/(1024*1024),3),'FM999000.000') || ' MB' WHEN max(round(tsu.tablespace_usedsize * dt.block_size)) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max(round(tsu.tablespace_usedsize * dt.block_size))/1024,3),'FM999000.000') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max(round(tsu.tablespace_usedsize * dt.block_size)),'FM999000.000') || ' ' END USED_SIZE , max(round((tsu.tablespace_size* dt.block_size )/(1024*1024),3) ) cur_size_MB , max(round((tsu.tablespace_usedsize* dt.block_size )/(1024*1024),3)) usedsize_MB FROM DBA_HIST_TBSPC_SPACE_USAGE tsu , DBA_HIST_TABLESPACE_STAT ts , DBA_HIST_SNAPSHOT sp , DBA_TABLESPACES dt WHERE ts.tsname = :TABLESPACE_NAME AND ts.tsname = dt.tablespace_name AND ts.ts# = tsu.tablespace_id AND tsu.snap_id = sp.snap_id GROUP BY trunc(sp.begin_interval_time) , ts.tsname ORDER BY trunc(sp.begin_interval_time)) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ select substr(tg1.DATES, 1, 16) DATES , tg1.TABLESPACE_NAME , tg1.CURRENT_SIZE , tg1.USED_SIZE --, tg1.usedsize_MB --, tg1.usedsize_MB - lag(usedsize_MB, 1, 0) over (PARTITION by tg1.TABLESPACE_NAME ORDER BY tg1.DATES, tg1.TABLESPACE_NAME) GROWTH , CASE WHEN round(tg1.usedsize_MB - lag(usedsize_MB) over (PARTITION by tg1.TABLESPACE_NAME ORDER BY tg1.DATES, tg1.TABLESPACE_NAME))> 1024 OR round(tg1.usedsize_MB - lag(usedsize_MB) over (PARTITION by tg1.TABLESPACE_NAME ORDER BY tg1.DATES, tg1.TABLESPACE_NAME))< -1024 THEN TO_CHAR(round((tg1.usedsize_MB - lag(usedsize_MB, 1, 0) over (PARTITION by tg1.TABLESPACE_NAME ORDER BY tg1.DATES, tg1.TABLESPACE_NAME))/1024,3),'FM999000.900')||' GB' --ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(round(tg1.usedsize_MB - lag(usedsize_MB) over (PARTITION by tg1.TABLESPACE_NAME ORDER BY tg1.DATES, tg1.TABLESPACE_NAME)), 0),'FM999000.900') || ' MB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(tg1.usedsize_MB - lag(usedsize_MB) over (PARTITION by tg1.TABLESPACE_NAME ORDER BY tg1.DATES, tg1.TABLESPACE_NAME), 0),'FM999000.900') || ' MB' END "GROWTH" from ts_growth tg1

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) with indseg as ( select s.OWNER , s.TABLESPACE_NAME , s.SEGMENT_TYPE , i.TABLE_NAME , i.INDEX_NAME , o.CREATED , o.LAST_DDL_TIME , o.OBJECT_TYPE , o.OBJECT_NAME , i.LAST_ANALYZED , i.NUM_ROWS , i.SAMPLE_SIZE , i.DISTINCT_KEYS , i.UNIQUENESS , i.DEGREE , i.INSTANCES , i.PARTITIONED , i.INITIAL_EXTENT , i.NEXT_EXTENT , s.EXTENTS , s.BYTES , i.visibility , i.segment_created , i.logging , i.status , dis.STATTYPE_LOCKED from dba_indexes i , dba_segments s , dba_objects o , dba_ind_statistics dis where --s.segment_name = i.index_name and --s.segment_type = 'INDEX' and --s.segment_name = dis.index_name and s.segment_name = o.object_name and s.owner = dis.owner and s.owner = i.owner and s.owner = o.owner and s.tablespace_name = i.tablespace_name and o.object_type in ('INDEX', 'TABLE') ) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- select 'select dbms_metadata.get_ddl('||''''||OBJECT_TYPE||''''||','||''''||OBJECT_NAME||''''||','||''''|| OWNER||''''||') "DDL_" from dual;' "GET DDL STMT" from indseg where tablespace_name = :TABLESPACE_NAME --AND --owner = :OWNER order by OWNER , TABLESPACE_NAME , TABLE_NAME , INDEX_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select case when PARTITIONED = 'NO' then 'execute dbms_stats.gather_table_stats('||''''||owner||''''||', '||''''||object_name||''''||', estimate_percent=>dbms_stats.auto_sample_size, degree=>dbms_stats.auto_degree, no_invalidate=>dbms_stats.auto_invalidate, cascade=>dbms_stats.auto_cascade, method_opt=>'||''''||'FOR ALL COLUMNS SIZE SKEWONLY'||''''||');' else 'execute dbms_stats.gather_table_stats('||''''||owner||''''||', '||''''||object_name||''''||', '||''''||partition_name||''''||', granularity=>'||''''||'AUTO'||''''||', estimate_percent=>dbms_stats.auto_sample_size, degree=>dbms_stats.auto_degree, no_invalidate=>dbms_stats.auto_invalidate, cascade=>dbms_stats.auto_cascade, method_opt=>'||''''||'FOR ALL COLUMNS SIZE SKEWONLY'||''''||');' end "Update Statisticss Statement" from (SELECT o.owner, o.object_name, o.object_type, t.TABLESPACE_NAME, o.status, o.CREATED, o.LAST_DDL_TIME, ts.last_analyzed, ts.num_rows, ts.sample_size, ts.STATTYPE_LOCKED, ts.STALE_STATS, t.DEGREE, t.INSTANCES, t.PARTITIONED, ts.partition_name FROM dba_objects o, dba_tab_statistics ts, dba_tables t WHERE o.owner = ts.owner AND o.owner = t.owner AND o.object_name = ts.table_name AND ts.table_name = t.table_name AND o.object_type = 'TABLE' AND o.owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) and t.TEMPORARY = 'N') where LAST_ANALYZED is NULL AND --STATTYPE_LOCKED is not null AND TABLESPACE_NAME = :TABLESPACE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select dbms_metadata.get_ddl('TABLESPACE', TABLESPACE_NAME)||';'||chr(13)||chr(10) "DDL" from ( select TABLESPACE_NAME from dba_tablespaces where tablespace_name not in ('SYSTEM', 'SYSAUX', 'USERS') and CONTENTS = 'PERMANENT' order by TABLESPACE_NAME )

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select a.inst_id , a.thread# , a.group# , a.SEQUENCE# --, substr(b.member, 1, instr(b.member, '/',-1)-1) "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" , a.blocksize , CASE WHEN instr(b.member, '+') > 1 THEN substr(b.member, 1, instr(b.member, '/',1)-1) WHEN instr(b.member, '/',-1) > 1 THEN substr(b.member, 1, instr(b.member, '/',-1)-1) WHEN instr(b.member, '\',-1) > 1 THEN substr(b.member, 1, instr(b.member, '\',-1)-1) END "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" , b.member , TO_CHAR(a.bytes/1024/1024, 'FM9000.00')||' MB' "REDO SIZE" , a.status , TO_CHAR(last_redo_time, 'DY YYYY-MON-DD HH:MI:SS AM') last_redo_time , TO_CHAR(checkpoint_time, 'DY YYYY-MON-DD HH:MI:SS AM') checkpoint_time from gv$log a , gv$logfile b , gv$thread c where a.inst_id = b.inst_id AND a.inst_id = c.inst_id AND a.group# = b.group# AND a.THREAD# = c.THREAD# AND a.inst_id = c.THREAD# order by a.inst_id , a.thread# , a.group# , "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP"

-- Author: Anand Mahajani -- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) -- Script To Find Redolog Switch History And Find Archivelog Size For Each Instances In RAC (Doc ID 2373477.1) SELECT to_char(to_Date(A.DAY, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), 'YYYY-MM-DD, Dy') "DATE" , INST_ID , (select instance_name from gv$instance gvi where gvi.inst_id = a.inst_id) instance_name , A.COUNT# "DAILY LOG SWITCHES" , round(A.COUNT#/24,3) "AVG HOURLY SWITCHES" , Round(A.Count#*B.AVG#/1024/1024/1024,2) "DAILY REDO (GB)" , CASE WHEN (A.Count#*B.AVG#) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((A.Count#*B.AVG#)/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM99000.00') || ' GB' WHEN (A.Count#*B.AVG#) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((A.Count#*B.AVG#)/(1024*1024),2),'FM99000.00') || ' MB' WHEN (A.Count#*B.AVG#) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((A.Count#*B.AVG#)/1024,2),'FM99000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR((A.Count#*B.AVG#),'FM99000.00') || ' ' END "DAILY_REDO (Estimate)" /* , CASE WHEN sum(blocks*block_size) >= 1024*1024 then to_char(round(sum(blocks*block_size)/1024/1024,2),'FM99000.00') || ' MB' WHEN sum(blocks*block_size) >= 1024 then to_char(round(sum(blocks*block_size)/1024,2),'FM99000.00') || ' KB' ELSE to_char(sum(blocks*block_size)) || ' B' END DAILY_REDO */ FROM ( SELECT To_Char(First_Time,'DD-MON-YYYY') DAY , INST_ID , Count(1) Count# , Min(RECID) Min# , Max(RECID) Max# FROM gv$log_history WHERE --THREAD# = :THREAD# AND First_Time >= trunc(sysdate) - 21 GROUP BY THREAD# , INST_ID , To_Char(First_Time,'DD-MON-YYYY') HAVING INST_ID = THREAD# ORDER BY To_Char(First_Time,'DD-MON-YYYY') ) A , ( SELECT Avg(BYTES) AVG# , Count(1) Count# , Max(BYTES) Max_Bytes , Min(BYTES) Min_Bytes FROM gv$log WHERE --THREAD# = :THREAD# AND First_Time >= trunc(sysdate) - 21 ) B order by "DATE" , INST_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT to_char(to_Date(A.DAY, 'DD-MON-YYYY'), 'YYYY-MM-DD, Dy') "DATE" --, INST_ID , (select instance_name from gv$instance gvi where gvi.inst_id = a.inst_id) instance_name --, A.COUNT# "DAILY LOG SWITCHES" --, round(A.COUNT#/24,3) "AVG HOURLY SWITCHES" , Round(A.Count#*B.AVG#/1024/1024/1024,2) "DAILY REDO (GB)" , CASE WHEN (A.Count#*B.AVG#) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((A.Count#*B.AVG#)/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM99000.00') || ' GB' WHEN (A.Count#*B.AVG#) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((A.Count#*B.AVG#)/(1024*1024),2),'FM99000.00') || ' MB' WHEN (A.Count#*B.AVG#) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((A.Count#*B.AVG#)/1024,2),'FM99000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR((A.Count#*B.AVG#),'FM99000.00') || ' ' END DAILY_REDO FROM ( SELECT To_Char(First_Time,'DD-MON-YYYY') DAY , INST_ID , Count(1) Count# , Min(RECID) Min# , Max(RECID) Max# FROM gv$log_history WHERE --THREAD# = :THREAD# AND First_Time >= trunc(sysdate) - 21 GROUP BY THREAD# , INST_ID , To_Char(First_Time,'DD-MON-YYYY') HAVING INST_ID = THREAD# ORDER BY To_Char(First_Time,'DD-MON-YYYY') ) A , ( SELECT Avg(BYTES) AVG# , Count(1) Count# , Max(BYTES) Max_Bytes , Min(BYTES) Min_Bytes FROM gv$log WHERE --THREAD# = :THREAD# AND First_Time >= trunc(sysdate) - 21 ) B order by "DATE" , INST_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/09/18 (of last update/validation) SELECT b.file_id file# , tablespace_name , CASE WHEN instr(b.file_name, '/',-1) > 1 THEN substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '/',-1)-1) WHEN instr(b.file_name, '\',-1) > 1 THEN substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '\',-1)-1) END "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" , b.file_name , CASE WHEN b.BLOCK_SIZE = '32768' THEN '32K' WHEN b.BLOCK_SIZE = '16384' THEN '16K' WHEN b.BLOCK_SIZE = '8192' THEN '8K' WHEN b.BLOCK_SIZE = '4096' THEN '4K' ELSE to_char(b.BLOCK_SIZE) END BLOCK_SIZE , b.creation_time , CASE WHEN current_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN current_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(current_size,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END ACTUAL , CASE WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END USED , CASE WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(free_space,0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE , CASE WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (b.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((b.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' ELSE CASE --WHEN max_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN max_size >= (b.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((b.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' --WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,2),'FM00000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END END MAX , increment_by "INCREMENT" , case WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (b.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((b.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' ELSE CASE --WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)/(1024*1024),2), 'FM000.00')||' TB' --WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= 32767 THEN TO_CHAR(32767, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)/(1024)), 'FM90000.00')||' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(round((current_size-free_space)/0.8),round(current_size/0.8)), 'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END END "PCT80" , TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(((current_size - free_space) / max_size) * 100,current_size/max_size*100),2), 'FM900.00') pct_used , ONLINE_STATUS STATUS FROM (SELECT file_id, FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY file_id ) A, ( SELECT df.file_id , df.file_name , d.block_size , d.creation_time , df.tablespace_name , FLOOR ((df.bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR ((DECODE (df.autoextensible, 'YES', df.maxbytes, df.bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , CASE WHEN df.autoextensible = 'YES' THEN case when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024/1024 || ' GB' when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024 || ' MB' else (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024||' KB' END end increment_by , df.ONLINE_STATUS FROM dba_data_files df , v$datafile d where df.file_id = d.file# ) b WHERE A.file_id(+) = b.file_id ORDER BY tablespace_name , b.file_id --, filesys , file_name

when power(2,floor(log(2,USED)+1)) >=(BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 then (BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1||'M;' when power(2,floor(log(2, USED))) < USED then power(2,floor(log(2, USED)+1))||'M;' else power(2,floor(log(2, USED)))||'M;' end "RESIZE DATAFILE(Ref: Used)" , 'ALTER DATABASE DATAFILE '||''''||FILE_NAME||''''||' RESIZE '|| case when power(2,floor(log(2,PCT80)+1)) >=(BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 then (BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1||'M;' when power(2,floor(log(2, PCT80))) < PCT80 then power(2,floor(log(2, PCT80)+1))||'M;' else power(2,floor(log(2, PCT80)))||'M;' end "RESIZE DATAFILE(Ref: PCT80)" from datafiles where FILE_NAME = :FILE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) WITH TSDETAILS as ( select a.tablespace_name , current_size , free_space , max_size from ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY tablespace_name ) a, ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR (SUM (DECODE (autoextensible, 'YES', maxbytes, bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , COUNT (file_name) files FROM dba_data_files GROUP BY tablespace_name ) b WHERE A.tablespace_name(+) = b.tablespace_name ORDER BY a.tablespace_name ) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ select TABLESPACE_NAME , CASE WHEN sum(current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(current_size)/(1024*1024),3),'FM9000.000') || ' TB' WHEN sum(current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(current_size)/1024,3),'FM9000.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(current_size),'FM9000.000') || ' MB' END "ACTUAL" , CASE WHEN sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size))/(1024*1024),3),'FM9000.000') || ' TB' WHEN sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size))/1024,3),'FM9000.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)),'FM9000.000') || ' MB' END "USED" , CASE WHEN sum(nvl(free_space,0)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(free_space,0))/(1024*1024),3),'FM9000.000') || ' TB' WHEN sum(nvl(free_space,0)) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(free_space,0))/1024,3),'FM9000.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(nvl(free_space,0)),'FM9000.000') || ' MB' END "FREE" , round(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size))/sum(current_size)*100, 3) "PCT USED" from TSDETAILS where tablespace_name = :TABLESPACE_NAME group by tablespace_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) WITH TSDETAILS as ( select * from ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY tablespace_name ) a, ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR (SUM (DECODE (autoextensible, 'YES', maxbytes, bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , COUNT (file_name) files FROM dba_data_files GROUP BY tablespace_name ) b WHERE A.tablespace_name(+) = b.tablespace_name ORDER BY a.tablespace_name ) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ select CASE WHEN sum(current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(current_size)/(1024*1024),3),'FM9000.000') || ' TB' WHEN sum(current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(current_size)/1024,3),'FM9000.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(current_size),'FM9000.000') || ' MB' END "ACTUAL" , CASE WHEN sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size))/(1024*1024),3),'FM9000.000') || ' TB' WHEN sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size))/1024,3),'FM9000.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)),'FM9000.000') || ' MB' END "USED" , CASE WHEN sum(nvl(free_space,0)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(free_space,0))/(1024*1024),3),'FM9000.000') || ' TB' WHEN sum(nvl(free_space,0)) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(free_space,0))/1024,3),'FM9000.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(nvl(free_space,0)),'FM9000.000') || ' MB' END "FREE" , round(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size))/sum(current_size)*100, 3) "PCT USED" from TSDETAILS

free_space, current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END USED , CASE WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(free_space,0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE /* ---- Keep it for extended testing , CASE WHEN nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END "80PCT" */ , CASE WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END "PCT80" --, nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0) AS "80PCT" , CASE WHEN max_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/(1024*1024),3),'FM99000.00') || ' TB' WHEN max_size = 32767 THEN TO_CHAR(32767, 'FM99000.00')||' MB' WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,3),'FM99000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM99000.00') || ' MB' END MAX , nvl(ROUND ( ( (current_size - free_space) / max_size) * 100),2) pct_used , files , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT EXTENT_MGMT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT SEGMENT_SPACE_MGMT , STATUS --, RANK() OVER(partition by b.tablespace_name order by files) "RANK" FROM ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY tablespace_name ) a, ( SELECT t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR (SUM (DECODE (autoextensible, 'YES', maxbytes, bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED , COUNT (file_name) files FROM dba_data_files df , dba_tablespaces t where t.tablespace_name = df.tablespace_name GROUP BY t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED ) b WHERE a.tablespace_name(+) = b.tablespace_name and b.CONTENTS = 'UNDO' ORDER BY tablespace_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) --DATAFILES SELECT b.file_id file# , tablespace_name , CASE WHEN instr(b.file_name, '+') > 1 THEN substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '/',1)-1) WHEN instr(b.file_name, '/',-1) > 1 THEN substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '/',-1)-1) WHEN instr(b.file_name, '\',-1) > 1 THEN substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '\',-1)-1) END "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" , b.file_name , creation_time , CASE WHEN current_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN current_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(current_size,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END ACTUAL , CASE WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END USED , CASE WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(free_space,0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE , CASE WHEN :BIGFILE = 'YES' THEN TO_CHAR((max_size/1024),'FM90000.00') || ' GB' -- additional coding needed to check for max file size based on block size ELSE CASE WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (b.block_size*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((b.block_size*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' ELSE CASE WHEN max_size >= (b.block_size*4096)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((b.block_size*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' --WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,2),'FM90000.00') || ' GB' --WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((b.block_size*4)-1,2),'FM90000.00') || ' MB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END END END "MAX SIZE" , increment_by "INCREMENT" , case WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (b.block_size*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((b.block_size*4)-1, 'FM9000.00')||' GB' ELSE CASE --WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)/(1024*1024),2), 'FM000.00')||' TB' WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)/(1024),2), 'FM9000.00')||' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8), 'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END END "PCT80" , TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(((current_size - free_space) / max_size) * 100,current_size/max_size*100),2), 'FM900.00') pct_used , ONLINE_STATUS STATUS FROM ( SELECT file_id, FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY file_id ) A, ( SELECT df.file_id , df.file_name , d.block_size , d.creation_time , df.tablespace_name , FLOOR ((df.bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR ((DECODE (df.autoextensible, 'YES', df.maxbytes, df.bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , CASE WHEN df.autoextensible = 'YES' THEN case when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024/1024 || ' GB' when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024 || ' MB' else (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024||' KB' END end increment_by , df.ONLINE_STATUS FROM dba_data_files df , v$datafile d where df.file_id = d.file# ) b WHERE A.file_id(+) = b.file_id and tablespace_name = :TABLESPACE_NAME ORDER BY file# , tablespace_name , file_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select TABLESPACE_NAME , OWNER , SEGMENT_NAME , EXTENT_ID , FILE_ID , BLOCK_ID , BYTES , BLOCKS , RELATIVE_FNO , COMMIT_JTIME , COMMIT_WTIME , STATUS from DBA_UNDO_EXTENTS where TABLESPACE_NAME = :TABLESPACE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INSTANCE_NUM INST_ID , TABLESPACE_NAME , FILE_ID --, RELATIVE_FNO , OWNER , SEGMENT_ID , SEGMENT_NAME , STATUS , BLOCK_ID , CASE WHEN INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN INITIAL_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN INITIAL_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(INITIAL_EXTENT,'FM9000') || ' ' END INITIAL_EXTENT , CASE WHEN NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN NEXT_EXTENT >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NEXT_EXTENT/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN NEXT_EXTENT >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NEXT_EXTENT/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(NEXT_EXTENT,'FM9000') || ' ' END NEXT_EXTENT , MIN_EXTENTS , MAX_EXTENTS , PCT_INCREASE from DBA_ROLLBACK_SEGS where TABLESPACE_NAME = :TABLESPACE_NAME

ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (b.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((b.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' ELSE CASE WHEN max_size >= (b.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((b.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END END MAX , increment_by "INCREMENT" , ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) "PCT80" , TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(((current_size - free_space) / max_size) * 100,current_size/max_size*100),2), 'FM900.00') pct_used , ONLINE_STATUS STATUS FROM (SELECT file_id, FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY file_id ) A, ( SELECT df.file_id , df.file_name , d.block_size , d.creation_time , df.tablespace_name , FLOOR ((df.bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR ((DECODE (df.autoextensible, 'YES', df.maxbytes, df.bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , CASE WHEN df.autoextensible = 'YES' THEN case when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024/1024 || ' GB' when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024 || ' MB' else (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024||' KB' END end increment_by , df.ONLINE_STATUS FROM dba_data_files df , v$datafile d where df.file_id = d.file# ) b WHERE A.file_id(+) = b.file_id ORDER BY tablespace_name , b.file_id --, filesys , file_name ) select /* current_size , USED , PCT80 , block_size */ 'ALTER DATABASE DATAFILE '||''''||FILE_NAME||''''||' RESIZE '|| case when power(2,floor(log(2, current_size)+1)) >=(BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 then (BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1||'M;' when power(2,floor(log(2, current_size))) < current_size then power(2,floor(log(2, current_size)+1))||'M;' else power(2,floor(log(2, current_size)))||'M;' end "RESIZE DATAFILE(Ref: Current)" , 'ALTER DATABASE DATAFILE '||''''||FILE_NAME||''''||' RESIZE '|| case when power(2,floor(log(2,USED)+1)) >=(BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 then (BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1||'M;' when power(2,floor(log(2, USED))) < USED then power(2,floor(log(2, USED)+1))||'M;' else power(2,floor(log(2, USED)))||'M;' end "RESIZE DATAFILE(Ref: Used)" , 'ALTER DATABASE DATAFILE '||''''||FILE_NAME||''''||' RESIZE '|| case when power(2,floor(log(2,PCT80)+1)) >=(BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 then (BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1||'M;' when power(2,floor(log(2, PCT80))) < PCT80 then power(2,floor(log(2, PCT80)+1))||'M;' else power(2,floor(log(2, PCT80)))||'M;' end "RESIZE DATAFILE(Ref: PCT80)" from datafiles where TABLESPACE_NAME = :TABLESPACE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/09/20 (of last update/validation) select CASE WHEN :BIGFILE = 'YES' then 'Cannot add datafile to a tablespace with BIGFILE' ELSE 'ALTER TABLESPACE '||:TABLESPACE_NAME||' ADD DATAFILE SIZE 1G AUTOEXTEND ON NEXT 10M MAXSIZE '|| CASE WHEN :BLOCK_SIZE = '8K' THEN '32767M;' WHEN :BLOCK_SIZE = '16K' THEN '65535M;' WHEN :BLOCK_SIZE = '32K' THEN '131070M;' END END DDL FROM dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , BEGIN_TIME , END_TIME , UNDOTSN , UNDOBLKS , TXNCOUNT , MAXQUERYLEN , MAXQUERYID , MAXCONCURRENCY , UNXPSTEALCNT , UNXPBLKRELCNT , UNXPBLKREUCNT , EXPSTEALCNT , EXPBLKRELCNT , EXPBLKREUCNT , SSOLDERRCNT , NOSPACEERRCNT , ACTIVEBLKS , UNEXPIREDBLKS , EXPIREDBLKS , TUNED_UNDORETENTION from GV$UNDOSTAT where INST_ID = substr(:TABLESPACE_NAME, -1, 1) AND trunc( END_TIME ) between trunc( sysdate - 2 ) and trunc( sysdate - 1 ) ORDER BY BEGIN_TIME DESC

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INSTANCE_NUMBER INST_ID , BEGIN_TIME , END_TIME , DBID , SNAP_ID , UNDOTSN , UNDOBLKS , TXNCOUNT , MAXQUERYLEN , MAXQUERYSQLID , MAXCONCURRENCY , UNXPSTEALCNT , UNXPBLKRELCNT , UNXPBLKREUCNT , EXPSTEALCNT , EXPBLKRELCNT , EXPBLKREUCNT , SSOLDERRCNT , NOSPACEERRCNT , ACTIVEBLKS , UNEXPIREDBLKS , EXPIREDBLKS , TUNED_UNDORETENTION from DBA_HIST_UNDOSTAT where INSTANCE_NUMBER = substr(:TABLESPACE_NAME, -1, 1) ORDER BY BEGIN_TIME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select OWNER , SEGMENT_NAME , TABLESPACE_NAME , EXTENT_ID , FILE_ID , BLOCK_ID , BYTES , BLOCKS , RELATIVE_FNO , COMMIT_JTIME , COMMIT_WTIME , STATUS from DBA_UNDO_EXTENTS where TABLESPACE_NAME = :TABLESPACE_NAME order by STATUS , OWNER , SEGMENT_NAME , TABLESPACE_NAME , EXTENT_ID , FILE_ID , BLOCK_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , cast(ADDR as VARCHAR2(16)) ADDR , XIDUSN , XIDSLOT , XIDSQN , UBAFIL , UBABLK , UBASQN , UBAREC , STATUS , START_TIME , START_SCNB , START_SCNW , START_UEXT , START_UBAFIL , START_UBABLK , START_UBASQN , START_UBAREC , SES_ADDR , FLAG , SPACE , RECURSIVE , NOUNDO , PTX , NAME , PRV_XIDUSN , PRV_XIDSLT , PRV_XIDSQN , PTX_XIDUSN , PTX_XIDSLT , PTX_XIDSQN --, DSCN-B --, DSCN-W , USED_UBLK , USED_UREC , LOG_IO , PHY_IO , CR_GET , CR_CHANGE , START_DATE , DSCN_BASE , DSCN_WRAP , START_SCN , DEPENDENT_SCN , XID , PRV_XID , PTX_XID from GV$TRANSACTION where --INST_ID = substr(:TABLESPACE_NAME, -1, 1) OR INST_ID = (select INST_ID from GV$PARAMETER where name = 'undo_tablespace' and value = :TABLESPACE_NAME) order by STATUS , START_TIME

free_space, current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END USED , CASE WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(free_space,0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE /* , CASE WHEN max_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/(1024*1024),3),'FM00000.00') || ' TB' WHEN max_size = 32767 THEN TO_CHAR(32767, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,3),'FM00000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END MAX ---- Keep it for extended testing , CASE WHEN nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END "80PCT" */ , CASE WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END "PCT80" --, nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0) AS "80PCT" , CASE WHEN max_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/(1024*1024),3),'FM90000.00') || ' TB' WHEN max_size = 32767 THEN TO_CHAR(32767, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,3),'FM90000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END MAX , nvl(ROUND ( ( (current_size - free_space) / max_size) * 100),2) pct_used , files , BIGFILE , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT EXTENT_MGMT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT SEGMENT_SPACE_MGMT , STATUS FROM ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY tablespace_name ) a, ( SELECT t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , FLOOR (SUM (tf.bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR (SUM (DECODE (tf.autoextensible, 'YES', maxbytes, bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , t.BIGFILE , COUNT (tf.file_name) files FROM dba_temp_files tf , dba_tablespaces t where t.tablespace_name = tf.tablespace_name GROUP BY t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , BIGFILE ) b WHERE A.tablespace_name(+) = b.tablespace_name ORDER BY tablespace_name

free_space,current_size)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size),'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END USED , CASE WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(free_space,0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE , CASE WHEN :BIGFILE = 'YES' THEN TO_CHAR((max_size/1024),'FM90000.00') || ' GB' -- additional coding needed to check for max file size based on block size ELSE CASE WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (b.block_size*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((b.block_size*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' ELSE CASE WHEN max_size >= (b.block_size*4096)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((b.block_size*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' --WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,2),'FM90000.00') || ' GB' --WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((b.block_size*4)-1,2),'FM90000.00') || ' MB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END END END "MAX SIZE" , increment_by "INCREMENT" , case WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (B.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((B.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1/1024, 'FM9000.00')||' GB' ELSE CASE --WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)/(1024*1024),2), 'FM000.00')||' TB' WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)/(1024),2), 'FM9000.00')||' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8), 'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END END "PCT80" , TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(((current_size - free_space) / max_size) * 100,current_size/max_size*100),2), 'FM900.00') pct_used --, ONLINE_STATUS STATUS FROM ( SELECT file_id, FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY file_id ) A, ( SELECT df.file_id , df.file_name , d.block_size , d.creation_time , df.tablespace_name , FLOOR ((df.bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR ((DECODE (df.autoextensible, 'YES', df.maxbytes, df.bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , CASE WHEN df.autoextensible = 'YES' THEN case when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024/1024 || ' GB' when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024 || ' MB' else (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024||' KB' END end increment_by --, df.ONLINE_STATUS FROM dba_temp_files df , v$datafile d where df.file_id = d.file# ) b WHERE A.file_id(+) = b.file_id and tablespace_name = :TABLESPACE_NAME ORDER BY file# , tablespace_name , file_name

, bytes , CASE WHEN round(sum(BYTES_RAW) over (partition by owner order by owner, segment_type)) > (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(round(sum(BYTES_RAW/1024/1024/1024/1024) over (partition by owner free_space, current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END USED , CASE WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(free_space,0),'FM9900.00') || ' MB' END FREE , CASE WHEN max_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/(1024*1024),3),'FM00000.00') || ' TB' WHEN max_size = 32767 THEN TO_CHAR(32767, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,3),'FM00000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM99000.00') || ' MB' END MAX /* ---- Keep it for extended testing , CASE WHEN nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END "80PCT" */ , CASE WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END "PCT80" --, nvl(ROUND((current_size-free_space)/0.8),0) AS "80PCT" , nvl(ROUND ( ( (current_size - free_space) / max_size) * 100),2) pct_used , files --, RANK() OVER(partition by b.tablespace_name order by files) "RANK" FROM ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY tablespace_name ) a, ( SELECT t.tablespace_name , CONTENTS , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR (SUM (DECODE (autoextensible, 'YES', maxbytes, bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , COUNT (file_name) files FROM dba_data_files df , dba_tablespaces t where t.tablespace_name = df.tablespace_name GROUP BY t.tablespace_name , CONTENTS ) b WHERE a.tablespace_name(+) = b.tablespace_name and b.CONTENTS = 'PERMANENT' ORDER BY tablespace_name)

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/09/20 (of last update/validation) --DATAFILES SELECT b.file_id file# , tablespace_name , case when substr(b.file_name, 1,1) = '+' then substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '/',1)-1) else substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '/',-1)-1) end "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" --, substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '/',-1)-1) "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" , b.file_name , creation_time , CASE WHEN current_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN current_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(current_size,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END ACTUAL , CASE WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END USED , CASE WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(free_space,0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE , CASE WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (B.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((B.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' ELSE CASE WHEN max_size >= (B.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((B.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' --WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,2),'FM90000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END END "MAX SIZE" , increment_by "INCREMENT" , case WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (B.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((b.block_size*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' GB' ELSE CASE --WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)/(1024*1024),2), 'FM000.00')||' TB' WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)/(1024),2), 'FM90000.00')||' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8), 'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END END "PCT80" , TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(((current_size - free_space) / max_size) * 100,current_size/max_size*100),2), 'FM900.00') pct_used , ONLINE_STATUS STATUS , RANK() OVER(partition by b.tablespace_name order by (nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size))) "RANK" , DENSE_RANK() OVER(partition by b.tablespace_name order by (nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size))) "DENSE_RANK" FROM ( SELECT file_id, FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY file_id ) A, ( SELECT df.file_id , df.file_name , d.block_size , d.creation_time , df.tablespace_name , FLOOR ((df.bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR ((DECODE (df.autoextensible, 'YES', df.maxbytes, df.bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , CASE WHEN df.autoextensible = 'YES' THEN case when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024/1024 || ' GB' when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024 || ' MB' else (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024||' KB' END end increment_by , df.ONLINE_STATUS FROM dba_data_files df , v$datafile d where df.file_id = d.file# ) b WHERE A.file_id(+) = b.file_id and tablespace_name = :TABLESPACE_NAME ORDER BY file# , tablespace_name , file_name

SELECT TO_CHAR( SP.BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) DAYS , TS.TSNAME , MAX( ROUND(( TSU.TABLESPACE_SIZE * DT.BLOCK_SIZE )/( 1024 * 1024 ), 2 )) CUR_SIZE_MB , MAX( ROUND(( TSU.TABLESPACE_USEDSIZE * DT.BLOCK_SIZE )/( 1024 * 1024 ), 2 )) USEDSIZE_MB FROM DBA_HIST_TBSPC_SPACE_USAGE TSU , DBA_HIST_TABLESPACE_STAT TS , DBA_HIST_SNAPSHOT SP , DBA_TABLESPACES DT WHERE TSU.TABLESPACE_ID = TS.ts# AND TSU.SNAP_ID = SP.SNAP_ID AND TS.TSNAME = DT.TABLESPACE_NAME AND TS.TSNAME NOT IN( 'SYSAUX' , 'SYSTEM' ) GROUP BY TO_CHAR( SP.BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) , TS.TSNAME ORDER BY TS.TSNAME , DAYS

with top10_ts as ( --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select * from ( SELECT b.tablespace_name , block_size , current_size ACTUAL , nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size) USED FROM ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY tablespace_name ) a, ( SELECT t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR (SUM (DECODE (autoextensible, 'YES', maxbytes, bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED , COUNT (file_name) files FROM dba_data_files df , dba_tablespaces t where t.tablespace_name = df.tablespace_name GROUP BY t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED ) b WHERE a.tablespace_name(+) = b.tablespace_name and b.CONTENTS = 'PERMANENT' ORDER BY used desc , tablespace_name ) where rownum < 11 ) SELECT TO_CHAR( SP.BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) DAYS , TS.TSNAME , MAX( ROUND(( TSU.TABLESPACE_SIZE * DT.BLOCK_SIZE )/( 1024 * 1024 ), 2 )) CUR_SIZE_MB , MAX( ROUND(( TSU.TABLESPACE_USEDSIZE * DT.BLOCK_SIZE )/( 1024 * 1024 ), 2 )) USEDSIZE_MB FROM DBA_HIST_TBSPC_SPACE_USAGE TSU , DBA_HIST_TABLESPACE_STAT TS , DBA_HIST_SNAPSHOT SP , top10_ts DT WHERE TSU.TABLESPACE_ID = TS.ts# AND TSU.SNAP_ID = SP.SNAP_ID AND TS.TSNAME = DT.TABLESPACE_NAME /*AND TS.TSNAME NOT IN( 'SYSAUX' , 'SYSTEM' ) */ --and rownum < 11 GROUP BY TO_CHAR( SP.BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) , TS.TSNAME ORDER BY DAYS , USEDSIZE_MB
